message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of this amazing product with you. I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my interest in the product. I believe $7500 would be a fair price for me to purchase it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you for $8200. What do you think?
